DamageImmunities: Bludgeoning, Slashing and Piercing from non-magical weapons

Traits.Name: Swarm Tactics
Traits.Content: When in a swarm, the giant fruit fly has advantage on attack rolls against creatures that are smaller than it.

Traits.Name: Evasive Flight
Traits.Content: The giant fruit fly's speed increases by 10 ft. when it moves away from a creature that its allies were within 5 feet of.

Actions.Name: Bite
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage. The target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the end of its next turn.

Actions.Name: Filth Spray
Actions.Content: Ranged Attack: +3 to hit, range 30 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) acid damage. The target must succeed on a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw or be blinded until the end of its next turn.
